review: *** ****** *** ***** My first approach with him was quite efficient. He gave a relevant time for the consultation & I was given a formal list of tests to be done. There is a follow up in the following month. The waiting period was appropriate and the whole experience was hospitable.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review: Very repeated doctor still he takes time to understand the issue and explain it to the patient. We consulted him for second opinion on the certain treatment and he was very helpful in explaining and referring to the other experts in the area. In the era where doctors have big ego, Dr Rajiv Sinha is a gem. Would definitely recommend him for Paed Nephrology.

****** *** ** * ****** ***** ******* Treatment is very
specific.. I think his best part of treatment is his observation and positive attitude... 
Great thankful for his support and bless....

I am not satisfied with doctor treatment. He will not give more time to patients because I visited for my son's urine problem and he just saw the report and he will not give more time to listen to our problem.

I went to hospital as I had kidney related problem. Treatment was good. Medicines was prescribed. Doctor was really good. I am satisfied with the treatment given. Waiting time was there in hospital. I can recommend doctor to my family or friends.
